---
title: "R code, add climate trends to Hydro.NC"
author: "Kaplan Issac"
---

[RCode_addTempROMS.zip](attachments/238256143.zip) R code provided by Hem Nalini Morzaria Luna.

Takes NC hydro files (already formatted as Atlantis inputs), then adds trends or anomalies to simulate climate change in temperature, salinity, or flux. Then repacks into Atlantis NC formats.
